synopsis.text: Hasukawa Kazuya's life is turned upside down when his brother marries Kazuya's secret love interest. Unable to bear living with the newlyweds, Kazuya moves into the eccentric Greenwood dormitory at Ryokuto Academy. There, Kazuya meets a cast of quirky characters, including motorbike enthusiasts, ghosts seeking closure, and a cross-dressing classmate. Though hoping for tranquility, Kazuya instead finds Greenwood to be a hub of zany adventures and misadventures. With the support of his new friends, Kazuya adjusts to dorm life and gets over his unrequited love. Just when Kazuya establishes stability at Greenwood, he meets a girl who captures his heart, sparking a hopeful new romance.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
